text: Aleksandr Purtov (born 27 October 1935) is a Soviet equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of the Soviet Union Category:Equestrians at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Aleksandr Purtov
